title: Disconnecting after Champ select.
body: So on my laptop after champ select, when I start loading the game, it goes to a black screen and after a bit gives me an error message "Unable to connect to the server.  Please check you network connection and attempt to reconnect to your game".  This has just started happening.  I can connect to everything else just fine and I've tried using Ethernet and WiFi.  This hasn't been happening on my Desktop though.  Note that my Laptop is windows 10 and Desktop windows 7 and I'm using the same account.  Has anyone else been having this problem?

replies.body:
It sounds like there may be specific settings on your laptop that could prevent your client from establishing a solid connection to the game server. It sounds like you've already tried some pretty good starting steps, so I recommend working through the rest of our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your settings are compatible with League.

Let me know if your disconnections persist through those changes.
Sorry it's been a while, I was really busy this week.  I actually just uninstalled and reinstalled the game and it's working now.  I dunno what it  was but it worked
